Event: I graduated from high school.
Post: "I graduated from high school, which means I'm officially set up for success in every aspect of my life - I'll get into a top college, land my dream job, and become a millionaire by 30!"

Event: I can't go see the movie today.
Post: "I can't go see the movie today; this is just typical of my whole life - always missing out on fun and never getting to do what I want."

Event: Had difficulty eating right.
Post: "Had difficulty eating right, which means I'm probably going to struggle with my overall health and wellness for the rest of my life."

Event: I don't feel well
Post: "I don't feel well, which means my health is probably going to hold me back from achieving everything I want in life and I'll never be able to enjoy the things that bring me joy."

Event: I experienced a lot of boredom and stress.
Post: "I'm feeling so bored and stressed out all the time, which means I'm probably never going to be happy or fulfilled in my life, and everything is just going to be a struggle."

Event: Got a bad haircut.
Post: "Got a bad haircut and it's just a sign that I'm going to have a terrible year, struggling with my self-confidence and probably making poor decisions in every aspect of my life."

Event: I killed my Furby
Post: "I killed my Furby, which means I'm probably going to be careless and irresponsible in every aspect of my life, ruining everything I touch."

Event: I let my slight aches be an excuse not to run.
Post: "I let my slight aches be an excuse not to run, which means I'm probably going to be lazy and unsuccessful in every aspect of my life."

Event: Having nothing to look forward to.
Post: "Having nothing to look forward to means I'm probably going to be stuck in this rut forever and never achieve anything significant in my life or relationships."

Event: I had Internet access restrictions at work.
Post: "I had Internet access restrictions at work, which means my whole career is going to be limited and I'll never be able to achieve anything significant."

Event: We had to suffer through two old episodes tonight
Post: "We had to suffer through two old episodes tonight, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in a rut and bored out of my mind for the rest of my life."

Event: Mr. Rat died suddenly.
Post: "Mr. Rat died suddenly; I guess this means my whole life is just going to be filled with tragedy and loss, and nothing will ever go right again."

Event: I found GIMP to be confusing.
Post: "I found GIMP to be confusing, which means I'm probably going to struggle with every creative project I take on and never be able to express myself artistically."

Event: My fingers have painful pokey feelings.
Post: "My fingers have painful pokey feelings, which means I'm probably going to be plagued by chronic health issues and never be able to fully enjoy life."

Event: Didn't finish anything.
Post: "I didn't finish anything, which means I'm probably going to be a slacker in every aspect of my life and never achieve any of my goals."

Event: The first tweet for today failed.
Post: "My first tweet for today failed, which means I'm probably going to have a terrible day overall and my entire social media presence is doomed to be a failure."

Event: My feet are killing me
Post: "My feet are killing me, which means I'm probably going to be held back from achieving my goals and living a healthy lifestyle in general."

Event: Missed my husband.
Post: "I missed my husband and it just hit me that I'm probably going to be unhappy in every aspect of my life, from my relationships to my career, because if I can't even get this right, what can I get right?"

Event: I couldn't stand the heat and humidity.
Post: "I couldn't stand the heat and humidity, which means I'm just not cut out for anything in life - I'll never be able to handle any kind of challenge or stress."

Event: I didn't get it!
Post: "I didn't get it!, which means I'm probably not cut out for learning anything new and my whole future is doomed to be a disappointment."

Event: My phone died on me.
Post: "My phone died on me, which means I'm probably going to be disconnected from everyone and everything in my life, struggling to stay organized and productive, and missing out on important opportunities."

Event: I am stuck at work on a nice day.
Post: "I'm stuck at work on a nice day, which means my whole life is just going to be one boring and unfulfilling experience after another - no freedom, no adventure, no joy."

Event: Feeling very tired
Post: "I'm feeling very tired today, which means I'm probably not cut out for anything in life and will never be able to achieve my goals."

Event: The bird is back.
Post: "The bird is back, which means my whole life is going to be filled with chaos and disorder, I'll never have any sense of control or stability again."

Event: Leaving Ocean City
Post: "Leaving Ocean City and it's like I'm leaving my happiness behind. This means I'll never find joy or contentment in any vacation or experience for the rest of my life."

Event: Twitter doesn't allow me to change my background image.
Post: "Twitter doesn't allow me to change my background image, which means I'm probably going to be stuck with this mediocre online presence and never have any real influence or success on social media."

Event: Didn't want to go to work.
Post: "Didn't want to go to work, which means I'm probably going to be lazy and unsuccessful in my career, and it's just the beginning of a downward spiral in all aspects of my life."

Event: The city smells like dead fish
Post: "The city smells like dead fish, which means I'll never be able to escape this feeling of disgust and disappointment in every aspect of my life - from my relationships to my career. Everything will always feel toxic and hopeless."

Event: Felt bored out of my mind
Post: "Felt bored out of my mind; I guess that means I'm just not cut out for anything interesting or exciting in life and will be stuck in a rut forever."

Event: Did not get his 24 fix tonight
Post: "Did not get his 24 fix tonight, which means I'm probably going to be stuck in this rut forever and never find happiness or fulfillment in anything I do."

Event: He wasn't there today.
Post: "He wasn't there today, which means I'm probably unlovable and will never find someone who truly cares about me in my entire life."

Event: I had a bad animal rights presentation.
Post: "I had a bad animal rights presentation, which means I'm probably going to fail at making a difference in the world and my whole career is going to be a disappointment."

Event: Willy has to get a CT scan because he can't walk properly.
Post: "Just found out I need a CT scan because I can't walk properly... I guess this means my whole life is going downhill and I'll never be able to achieve anything physically or mentally, not to mention the financial burden it's going to put on me and my family."

Event: I'm getting hungry
Post: "I'm getting hungry, which means I'll probably never be able to take care of myself and will always struggle to meet my basic needs."

Event: Deleted her number from my phone contacts
Post: "Deleted her number from my phone contacts; I guess this means I'm not capable of maintaining any meaningful relationships and will end up isolated and lonely in life."

Event: You made me sad.
Post: "You made me sad; I guess that means I'm just an unhappy person who will always be miserable in all my relationships and experiences."

Event: It's my colleagues' last day at work.
Post: "My colleague is leaving, which means our whole team is going to fall apart, and we'll never be able to achieve our goals or succeed in any project again."

Event: The lights killed the mood
Post: "The lights killed the mood, which means I'm probably going to ruin every special moment in my life and never be able to create a romantic atmosphere again."

Event: My lip ring doesn't cooperate with me.
Post: "My lip ring doesn't cooperate with me, which means I'm probably going to have bad luck with everything I wear and my whole sense of style is doomed."

Event: Our neighbor uprooted the mushroom.
Post: "Our neighbor uprooted the mushroom, which means they're probably going to ruin everything good in our neighborhood and make our whole lives miserable."

Event: I missed my daughter's 1st birthday party.
Post: "I missed my daughter's 1st birthday party, which means I'm probably going to be a terrible parent and fail at building a strong relationship with her for the rest of my life."

Event: My keyboard's getting worse.
Post: "My keyboard's getting worse, which means my whole productivity is going downhill and I'll never be able to get anything done efficiently."

Event: I am lonely and broke.
Post: "I'm lonely and broke, which means I'll probably never find true love or financial stability in my life - I'm just destined to be unhappy and unsuccessful."
